title: Partnership with American Journalism Project to support local news
summary: The American Journalism Project (AJP) has partnered with OpenAI to explore how artificial intelligence (AI) can support local news. OpenAI will provide $5m to AJP to support its work and up to $5m in API credits to help its grantee organisations assess and deploy emerging AI technologies. The partnership aims to establish dialogue between the local news industry and OpenAI and develop tools that could assist local news organisations. AJP will use the funds to experiment with AI applications, including creating a technology and AI studio and making pilot investments in its portfolio organisations.
